spring.subject: Dear @^
spring.body: Spring has ended but the tax goes on. You have paid us {gold}g this season, keep up the good work. By the way, here a little gift as our gratitude. ^^ -The IRS

summer.subject: Hey, @,^
summer.body: Are you well? does the heat been bugging you? By the way, here's this season's summary : ^^ 1. Paid {gold}g. Use it wisely. ^^ -Your 'Friend'

fall.subject: Autumn Thoughts
fall.body: The leaves are freezing. A perfect time to reflect and plan ahead (fishing or mining). Hope this will help you in the winter. ^^ -IT

winter.subject: Winter Warmth
winter.body: You paid us {gold}g this year, but we miss counted your tax money. So here's your refund, hope this will help you start the season. ^^ -Tax Collector
